title: Jocko Podcast 249: "About Face" is The Benchmark for Leadership. Including Foreword by Jocko
description:
Join the conversation on Twitter/Instagram:
@jockowillink @echocharles 

0:00:00 - Opening. Jocko's foundations of leadership. The Foreword for the new release of "About Face".

0:40:43 - Discussion

0:46:43 - Lessons from Hackworth still applicable today.

1:20:08 - Final thoughts and take-aways.

1:27:42 - How to stay on THE PATH.
JOCKO STORE Apparel:  https://www.jockostore.com/collections/men
Jocko Fuel: https://originmaine.com/nutrition 
Origin Jeans and Clothes: https://originmaine.com/durable-goods/ 
Origin Gis: https://originmaine.com/bjj-mma-fit/

1:58:40 - Closing gratitude.
